text:
Embryo Options | Senior Software Engineer, Junior Software Engineer | Boston, MA | ONSITE | Salary: 70k-140k | NO VISA

Embryo Options is helping fertility clinics manage their cryopreserved biological tissue, so they can focus on their patients. We're a profitable, bootstrapped startup, and we're looking to build-out our team as we ride the wave of the quickly-growing IVF market.

We're currently 2 full time engineers, so you'll have the opportunity to immediately make an impact and you'll have ownership of projects that directly impact our clinics and patients.

We currently use a mix of old and new technologies built on JavaScript, C#/.NET, SQL Server and deployed on AWS, and we're working on some new applications with .NET Core API and VueJS.

If you're a product-focused engineer, looking to join a fast-moving team in a real, growing business then we'd love to hear from you!

You can email me, Mike Gerbush (CTO), directly at mgerbush+hn@embryooptions.com.
